control.name: sbCalc
control.description: The GridControl is split vertically via the GridSplitContainer object. The TopRowIndex property is used to slide the View to the required line.

control.name: sbSplit
control.description: The ShowSplitView method displays the splitter that divides the container into two regions, each displaying a Grid Control.

control.name: sbRemoveSplit
control.description: The HideSplitView method removes the splitter and the second grid control.
